column33: Predator disturbance - grouse didn't flush, but stayed low until 061. Everyone down again by 6:45 - up at 6:17. 6:21 - all flew ~ 20 birds
Breeder & non-strutter collected at 6:50 immediately after cop. by breeder
Went to WD late - 6 males flushed as we approached. W adjacent to breeding male. At 6:39 - 12 females flushed + 2 more in sagebrush. Left at 6:40
